trends: There have been 74 other sightings in Stephenville
There were no other sightings in Stephenville on or around December 6th 2008
Summary: Bright light flashing colors near Stephenville, Texas.
divs: Sighting DetailsI live in Stephenville,Texas... I still believe that about 90% of reported cases of UFO sightings are either wishful thinking, mistaken stars sightings, planes or weater baloon sightings... HOWEVER... On this night, I heard someone outside talking about a star... So I went out to see what she was talking about. I observed a bright light in the southern sky that appeared to be spinning or changing colors. Flickering to brighter and then almost fade out entirely. There was not a pattern to the colors. It would mostly be a white or bright light and would appear to flicker and change colors and shape. I watched it for a long time, probably 45 minutes or so, but was too cold and went inside. I came back 10 minutes later, and it was GONE! I have seen MANY flickering stars in my life... BUT This was NOT a star, planet, plane or weather baloon. It is unidentifiably anything I've EVER seen. Chalk this up as an unknown... But I will be more open minded from now on! I will now WATCH for these things, and report back. Thanks, Starwatcher
